title: macson
author: macson
content: you all must know about this man.in 2022 he did a lot of brainwashing with his opinion which sounded good but it was a fraud. ¬†the UK government acted swiftly when he committed a crime that i saw as not deserving of tolerance. ¬†QuoteTeachers in the United Kingdom are creating lesson plans to re-educate teenage students who have been brainwashed by misogynistic influencer Andrew Tate, according to a report.Tate, who is locked up in a Romanian prison on charges of rape and sex trafficking, has had a toxic effect on teens who have embraced his hateful ideology, forcing teachers to address his views with their students, according to The Sunday Times.A school in south London gave a presentation to a group of 14-year-olds after teachers became concerned about the students‚Äô expressing ideas they learned from Tate, a self-described misogynist who has amassed a massive following of mostly young men on social media.Quote‚ÄúWhen you have 100 girls of your own you do not have to force any woman to do anything,‚Äù he told the UK paper.Tate‚Äôs now-shuttered sex cam operation had been a ‚Äúperfectly legal business,‚Äù stated Vieru, whom The Times only said was Tate‚Äôs partner in ‚Äúother businesses.‚ÄùRomanian police, however, busted Tate, 36, his brother, Tristan, 34, and two ‚ÄúTate‚Äôs Angels‚Äù ‚Äî one of his girlfriends, Georgiana Naghel, an ex-cop named as Luana Radu in reports‚Äî accusing them of sex trafficking.[1] https://nypost.com/2023/01/07/uk-schools-re-educating-teens-brainwashed-by-andrew-tate-report/[2] https://nypost.com/2023/01/06/andrew-tates-sex-cam-girls-branded-with-owned-by-tate-tattoos/

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I had seen a couple of interviews that man has given to some podcast host and he is definitely a threat to the mind of vulnerable and naive young men.He almost sees women as simple objects and property and likes to show off at his wealth on internet, as the "alpha" male he wants people to believe he is, hopefully, he is locked up in the case those alleged crimes are true.In my personal opinion, it is job of the parents to protect their children and teens from the ideas and influence of people like him, unfortunately parenting quality has gone downhill this last decade..

comments.author: Newlifebtc
comments.body: Not all country that this particular man is popular or it's been no like me have not come across the man or see if the money in a puddle in my old nation so I think it is a few people who knows him I cannot talk about it because I don't really know him except that I will research on him then it is when I will be able to discuss anything concerning him

comments.author: BossTrack
comments.body: Who has more capability to "brainwash" people? An online influencer you have to choose to watch or government agents that force children against their will to be propagandized with their world view for over 10 years?

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: Newlifebtc on January 09, 2023, 10:29:08 PMNot all country that this particular man is popular or it's been no like me have not come across the man or see if the money in a puddle in my old nation so I think it is a few people who knows him I cannot talk about it because I don't really know him except that I will research on him then it is when I will be able to discuss anything concerning himYou don't know him doesn't mean that he is not dangerous. He was popular in the UK and Romania and he influenced many teens. He thought them so many unethical practices such as rape, pornography, pimping, and even women molestation. Most teens that have been exposed to his teachings or programs might grow up to assume that women are properties of men. He encouraged young people to have as meant sex partners as possible so that they can freely choose from their fleets. The school is doing a good job by organizing programs to reorient these students that have been brainwashed. They need to be educated so that they wouldn't express the disastrous and unacceptable teachings of Andrew Tate.
